LanguageData.CGHE.label: CG High Explosive
LanguageData.CGHEAT.label: CG High Explosive Anti-Tank
LanguageData.CGHEAT.description: Shape charge explosive capable to penetrate armored target.
LanguageData.CGADM.label: CG Area Defense Munition
LanguageData.CGADM.description: Flechette round for close range defense.
LanguageData.GrenadeBB.label: 40mm Bean Bag Grenade
LanguageData.GrenadeF.label: 40mm Flechette
LanguageData.GrenadeF.description: Flechette round for close range defense.
LanguageData.GrenadeStun.label: 40mm Stun Grenade
LanguageData.GrenadeFoam.label: 40mm Foam Grenade
LanguageData.GrenadeFoam.description: Non-Lethal Foam Round, capable to extinghish fire.
LanguageData.TEA.label: 66mm Incendiary
LanguageData.TEA.description: Incendiary round to scorch an area with flames.
LanguageData.PzFHEAT.label: Panzerfaust HEAT
LanguageData.PzFHEAT.description: Mass produced Shape Charge Anti-Tank Warhead, excellent counter armored target.
LanguageData.PzFFrag.label: Panzerfaust Frag
LanguageData.PzFFrag.description: Modified warhead, filled with metal fragments and shrapnels.
LanguageData.RPzBHEAT.label: 88mm RPzB HEAT
LanguageData.RPzBHEAT.description: Mass produced Shape Charge Anti-Tank Rocket, excellent counter armored target, only work with direct hit since it doesn't has enough fragmentation effects for area damage.
LanguageData.RPzBFrag.label: 88mm RPzB Frag(ID)
LanguageData.RPzBFrag.description: Modified Shape Charge Anti-Personnel Rocket, excellent counter soft target, not designed for direct hit since the fragment covers are on the side of the warhead.
